question: Who has become Asia's richest man, with a net worth of $41.1 billion as per Forbes Real-Time Billionaires List.
explanation: According to the Forbes Real-Time Billionaires List, Hui Ka Yan, the chairman of Chinese real estate giant Evergrande Group, has become Asia's richest man, with a net worth of $41.1 billion. The Asia's second and third richest persons are Tencent Holdings Chairman Ma Huateng ($39.1 billion), Alibaba Group Chairman Jack Ma ($38.9 billion) respectively.
